title: What European city has the most futuristic appearance? - Futuristic Technology ✔ - Quora

response.answer_text: ANSWER CREDIT : Eric Marsh  I can’t really say which European city has “the most” futuristic appearance. None of the ones I’ve visited would fit that criteria when taken as a whole. However I will say that there is a section of Valencia, Spain named “The City of Arts and Sciences” that is very modern looking. The movie Tomorrowland was filmed there. . There are many very beautiful classical buildings in Valencia too. But since you asked about the modern I will only show those that are modern. The classic buildings I will save for another question.
